name: idonthavespotify
title: I Don't Have Spotify
description: Effortlessly convert Spotify links to your preferred streaming service
author: sjdonado

commands.name: search
commands.title: Convert Link to All Platforms
commands.subtitle: I Don't Have Spotify
commands.description: Effortlessly convert Spotify links to your preferred streaming service.

commands.name: toSpotify
commands.title: Convert Link to Spotify
commands.subtitle: I Don't Have Spotify
commands.description: Convert a link from YouTube Music, Apple Music, Deezer, or SoundCloud to Spotify and copy it back.

commands.name: toYouTube
commands.title: Convert Link to YouTube Music
commands.subtitle: I Don't Have Spotify
commands.description: Convert a link from Spotify, Apple Music, Deezer, or SoundCloud to YouTube Music and copy it back.

commands.name: toAppleMusic
commands.title: Convert Link to Apple Music
commands.subtitle: I Don't Have Spotify
commands.description: Convert a link from Spotify, YouTube Music, Deezer, or SoundCloud to Apple Music and copy it back.

commands.name: toDeezer
commands.title: Convert Link to Deezer
commands.subtitle: I Don't Have Spotify
commands.description: Convert a link from Spotify, YouTube Music, Apple Music, or SoundCloud to Deezer and copy it back.

commands.name: toSoundCloud
commands.title: Convert Link to SoundCloud
commands.subtitle: I Don't Have Spotify
commands.description: Convert a link from Spotify, YouTube Music, Apple Music, or Deezer to SoundCloud and copy it back.
